thread.title: LA Galaxy troll Portland Timbers player with Shooting Stars meme after he produces horrendous dive
thread.title_full: LA Galaxy troll Portland Timbers player with Shooting Stars meme after he produces horrendous dive

author: Thomas Bristow
title: LA Galaxy troll Portland Timbers player with Shooting Stars meme after he produces horrendous dive
text:
Sport LA Galaxy troll Portland Timbers player with Shooting Stars meme after he produces horrendous dive The Galaxy defender was so riled up by the referee awarding a foul he got booked for dissent - moments later, he was sent off Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now LA Galaxy troll Portland Timbers' Diego Chara on Twitter Share this video Get football   Thank you for subscribing!   
LA Galaxy have brilliantly trolled a Portland Timbers midfielder following their 1-0 home defeat on Sunday. 
Shortly after scoring, Diego Chara of the visiting side won a foul on the half hour mark after producing a horrendous dive. 
The simulation caused an (understandably) angry reaction from victim Jelle van Damme - which saw him booked for his outburst. 
Three minutes later, the LA Galaxy defender was sent packing after receiving a second yellow. 
Despite the second booking being his fault, it was clear the dive had played a crucial in his sending off. The foul that never was (Photo: @LAGalaxy/Twitter) 
Playing out the rest of the game with 10 men, Galaxy failed to muster any sort of comeback and lost the game 1-0. 
Following their home defeat, Galaxy decided to get their own back on Chara. 
On Monday night, the Los Angeles team posted a brilliant Shooting Stars meme video of Chara's dive on Twitter. (Photo: @LAGalaxy/Twitter) 
The Shooting Stars song has taken the Internet by storm in recent weeks and Galaxy have jumped on the bandwagon to troll the Timbers midfielder. 
The song was first released by Australian electronic duo Bag Raiders in 2008, but has been used in recent weeks to troll various celebrities. 
However, this story isn't over yet. Portland Timbers responded... poll loading Have you ever seen a shooting star? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
